StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [UpdateMedicalStatusWaiversDates]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWAID int, @AnnualCert1 date.me = NULL, @AnnualCert2 date.me = NULL, @AnnualCert3 date.me = NULL, @AnnualCert4 date.me = NULL, @HIVDate date.me = NULL, @PAPDate date.me = NULL, @FlightPEDate date.me = NULL, @DatePlacedNOE date.me = NULL, @DateReleasedNOE date.me = NULL, @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MEDICAL_STATUS_WAIVERS_DATES WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID) BEGIN UPDATE [MEDICAL_STATUS_WAIVERS_DATES] SET [ANNUAL_CERT_1] = @AnnualCert1, [ANNUAL_CERT_2] = @AnnualCert2, [ANNUAL_CERT_3] = @AnnualCert3, [ANNUAL_CERT_4] = @AnnualCert4, [HIV_DATE] = @HIVDate, [PAP_DATE] = @PAPDate, [FLIGHT_PE_DATE] = @FlightPEDate, [DATE_PLACED_NOE] = @DatePlacedNOE, [DATE_RELEASED_NOE] = @DateReleasedNOE, [USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin, [UPDATE_DATE] = getdate() WHERE [NWA_ID] = @NWAID END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [MEDICAL_STATUS_WAIVERS_DATES] ([NWA_ID], [ANNUAL_CERT_1], [ANNUAL_CERT_2], [ANNUAL_CERT_3], [ANNUAL_CERT_4], [HIV_DATE], [PAP_DATE], [FLIGHT_PE_DATE], [DATE_PLACED_NOE], [DATE_RELEASED_NOE], [USER_LOGIN], [UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@NWAID, @AnnualCert1, @AnnualCert2, @AnnualCert3, @AnnualCert4, @HIVDate, @PAPDate, @FlightPEDate, @DatePlacedNOE, @DateReleasedNOE, @UserLogin, getdate()) END
